body_html: @sinkingsugar - thanks for calling this out and for the patch work. It's always important to hear about the use cases and issues out there. We definitely see the need for something similar to ATen in PyTorch 1.0, but are still figuring out what that dividing line is. Your specific needs (and others) will help us on that as well.
